ng-add.description: Adds Essential JS 2 specific Angular package to an application

dashboardlayout-default.description: Create an Angular component with EJ2 undefined with default

dashboardlayout-dragging.description: Create an Angular component with EJ2 undefined with dragging

dashboardlayout-floating.description: Create an Angular component with EJ2 undefined with floating

dashboardlayout-media-query.description: Create an Angular component with EJ2 undefined with media-query

dashboardlayout-resizing.description: Create an Angular component with EJ2 undefined with resizing

splitter-horizontalsplitter.description: Create an Angular splitter component with horizontal orientation.

splitter-nestedsplitter.description: Create an Angular splitter component with nested layout.

splitter-verticalsplitter.description: Create an Angular splitter component with vertical orientation.
